keyMoments.title: Confrontation with Hachi
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones and the New Fish-Man Pirates confront Hatchan at Fish-Man District when he tries to warn them against their plans.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's commitment to their ideology and their willingness to attack former allies.

keyMoments.title: Successfully Breach Ryugu Palace
keyMoments.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates successfully infiltrate and breach Ryugu Palace as part of their coup attempt.
keyMoments.significance: Major tactical victory that sets up the main conflict of the Fish-Man Island arc.

goals: Carry out Arlong's will of fish-man supremacy
ideology: Fish-man supremacy and hatred of humans

reveals.information: The crew has learned from Arlong's mistakes and created a more sophisticated plan for fish-man supremacy
The crew has allied with the Flying Pirates (Vander Decken IX) and hired Hyouzou as a mercenary

keyMoments.title: Alliance Structure Clarified
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken IX clarifies that he is Hody Jones's ally, not his subordinate, maintaining his independence.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the fragile nature of the villainous alliance and Decken's pride.

keyMoments.title: Attack on Hachi
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken IX demonstrates his Mato Mato powers by attacking Hachi at Hody's request.
keyMoments.significance: First combat use of the Flying Pirates in cooperation with the New Fish-Man Pirates.

goals: Maintain alliance with New Fish-Man Pirates for mutual benefit
ideology: Personal obsession rather than political ideology

reveals.information: Decken insists on being treated as an equal ally to Hody, not a subordinate

keyMoments.title: Luffy Escorts Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: Luffy escorts Shirahoshi out of her tower to the Sea Forest, appearing to 'kidnap' her from the palace.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's willingness to help others achieve their dreams, even if it means breaking rules.

keyMoments.title: Defend Ryugu Palace
keyMoments.description: Zoro, Nami, and Usopp defend the palace against attacking goons.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's loyalty to their hosts and willingness to protect them.

keyMoments.title: Sanji and Chopper Find Wounded Hachi
keyMoments.description: Sanji and Chopper discover Hachi severely wounded and learn of the palace attack.
keyMoments.significance: Brings the crew into awareness of the imminent threat to the royal family.
